entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -39.3°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38 with temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
